multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the purpose of dictionary comprehensions?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To create a dictionary with keys and values in a concise manner
To iterate over a list and perform operations on each element
To create a new list with transformed elements from an existing list
To create a dictionary with keys and values from a list of tuples
